page.title: 01Description:Ferryside Area.
page.content: Our area lies on the estuary of the {River Towy in Dyfed,West Wales.} It's a beautiful area and attracts hundreds of tourists each year. The main village is {Ferryside.}It's a linear village stretching northwards along the eastern bank of the estuary. Ferryside is a thriving village.There is a {Victorian school}and a{Yacht {Club}which is on the site of the old {Lifeboat Station }and is a centre for all kinds of water sports.The{main {line from London to Fishguard}runs through the village.Passenger trains and freight trains travel along the line and oil is also transported from Milford Haven .There is a{railway {station}standing near which is a { {signal box }and {crossing.(continued {on next page). { }
